remarks: Move a scalar product out of a composition of operators.  The operator ` T ` must be linear, unlike ~ homco1 that works for any operators. (Contributed by NM, 13-Aug-2006.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: homco2 $p |- ( ( A e. CC /\ T e. LinOp /\ U : ~H --> ~H ) -> ( T o. ( A .op U ) ) = ( A .op ( T o. U ) ) ) $.
